Grania Eve Kaiman Davis (July 17, 1943 , April 28, 2017) bụ onye edemede America na onye nchịkọta akụkọ akụkọ sayensị na akụkọ ifo na akụkọ mkpirikpi.  Ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ mbụ nke ọrụ di mbụ ya, Avram Davidson, bipụtara mgbe ọ nwụsịrị

Akụkọ ya dị mkpirikpi apụtala na magazin dị iche iche, anthologies, na nchịkọta "nke kachasị mma".  A họpụtara The Boss in the Wall (1998, Tachyon Publications na Avram Davidson) maka onyinye Nebula na ngalaba Best Novella.

Amụrụ Davis Grania Eve Kaiman na Milwaukee, Wisconsin, ma too na Hollywood, California. 
Ọ lụrụ Avram Davidson na mbido afọ 1960 n'ụlọ ndị edemede ibe ya Damon Knight na Kate Wilhelm na Milford, Pennsylvania, ha wee mụọ nwa nwoke, Ethan, n'afọ 1962
Ha biri na New York City na Amecameca, Mexico, tupu ha agbasaa alụmdi na nwunye ha ma ha abụọ kwaga San Francisco
Ọ biri na San Rafael, California, ruo ọtụtụ afọ ya na di ya nke abụọ, Stephen L
